item.title: Today is the day for the landrush of .global, .website, and .press domain names
item.description:
Starting August 27th, Singapore time, several top-level domain names will be up for grabs in a “landrush” phase, according to online brand specialist IP Mirror. The “sunrise” phase, reserved for trademark holders to register their brands, precedes this period. During the landrush phase, anyone can secure remaining domain names at a premium price. IP Mirror highlights “.global” as a particularly appealing option, signifying a broad international reach. This domain’s landrush phase lasts from August 27th to September 4th...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/today-is-the-day-for-the-landrush-of-global-website-and-press-domain-names/

item.title: You can now get .cn domain names from GoDaddy
item.description:
GoDaddy, a company that provides technology specifically to small businesses, now offers a total of 421 domain name extensions. This increase is due to the addition of the “.cn” domain, China’s country code. This expansion targets the growing number of Chinese residents seeking to establish an online presence. China boasts over 1.6 billion internet users, with over 600 million residing within the country itself. While China has registered over 16 million “...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/you-can-now-get-cn-domain-names-from-godaddy/

item.title: The domain name "Dot World" is now in the sunrise period for Chinese, Japanese, and Korean languages
item.description:
Stable Tone’s DotWorld_IDN Registry has started the sunrise period for its Chinese, Japanese, and Korean top-level domain (TLD). This period, ending on November 10, 2015, allows trademark holders with prior rights to register DotWorld_IDN domain names before the public launch. Starting November 17, 2015, anyone can register these domains on a first-come, first-served basis. The two-character domain extension, 世界, translates to “world” in all three languages (pronounced “shijie” in Chinese, “seikai” in Japanese, and “segye” in Korean)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-domain-name-dot-world-is-now-in-the-sunrise-period-for-chinese-japanese-and-korean-languages/

item.title: GoDaddy is dedicated to creating impressive and impactful business identities for small businesses
item.description:
GoDaddy: Expanding Beyond Domains to Empower Small Businesses While GoDaddy is known for domain names, it has evolved into much more. CEO Blake Irving emphasizes the company’s focus on supporting small businesses, a demographic often overlooked despite representing a significant portion of most economies. Irving highlights that small businesses, even those with a single employee, present a vast untapped market. Traditional solutions often cater to either large enterprises or individual consumers, leaving small businesses underserved...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/godaddy-is-dedicated-to-creating-impressive-and-impactful-business-identities-for-small-businesses/
